short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download invoices automatically from various service providers, e-commerce platforms and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GetInvoice Chrome Extension allows you to automatically fetch invoices from your portals: Amazon, Adobe, Google Ads, ... and lots more.

These invoices are sent to your GetInvoice account and can also be set up to be downloaded locally to your computer. We're adding new portals every day so all your invoices can be collected by our extension, so don't hesitate to ask for the ones you need!

The extension navigates to your portals and scrapes the invoices. We only store invoices that are sent to GetInvoice, no other data is stored.  

A GetInvoice account is required to use this extension (there's a free plan available).

What portal should we add next?
